publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3414 Mr Brian Monteith: The Menteith Shinty Festival, Callander-That the Parliament congratulates the Menteith Camanachd Club on holding yet another successful shinty festival in Callander, West Perthshire, this year; welcomes the efforts of the organisers and the boys and girls in promoting the cause of shinty; applauds the success of Aberdour Under 9s, Rockfield Under 12s and Menteith Under 15s in winning their sections, and looks forward to the festival growing from strength to strength in future years. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-3414 The Menteith Shinty Festival, Callander (lodged on 20 September 2002) Murdo Fraser*
S1M-3414 The Menteith Shinty Festival, Callander (lodged on 20 September 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3414 The Menteith Shinty Festival, Callander (lodged on 20 September 2002) Ms Margo MacDonald*
S1M-3414 The Menteith Shinty Festival, Callander (lodged on 20 September 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-3414 The Menteith Shinty Festival, Callander (lodged on 20 September 2002) John Farquhar Munro*
